response.original_title: Invisible Toddler: The Carlee Russell Saga
response.overview: Carlee Russell's disappearance was one of the most mysterious in history: the 25-year-old vanished without a trace after calling 911 to report a toddler walking alone on the side of a highway. But after she showed up on her parents' doorstep a couple days later without explanation, the details of her story quickly started unraveling.
response.title: Invisible Toddler: The Carlee Russell Saga

results.name: Invisible Toddler: The Carlee Russell Saga (full documentary)
